issues: Inconsistent date formatting across sections (e.g., 'Juillet / Août 2025' vs. '2024 - Present')
Lack of specific dates or date ranges for association memberships.
Too much whitespace in some sections, making it appear disjointed.
suggestions: Standardize date formats (e.g., Month Year - Month Year or Year - Year).
Include specific start and end dates (if applicable) for each role in associations.
Reduce excessive whitespace for a more compact and professional look. Consider using a template.

strengths: Demonstrates a broad range of technical skills.
Includes diverse project experience, both educational and humanitarian.
Shows active involvement in extracurricular activities and certifications.
weaknesses: Lacks specific examples and quantifiable results for projects and experiences relevant to server-side development.
Doesn't explicitly highlight server-side development skills matching the job description (Node.js, Django, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, database management).
The descriptions of projects are too generic, lacking details of server-side contributions and technologies used.
suggestions: Quantify achievements in projects (e.g., 'Reduced database query time by X%').
Highlight experiences and projects specifically showcasing server-side development skills mentioned in the job description.

Provide more details about the technologies used and the specific role in each project. Tailor project descriptions towards server-side responsibilities like API design, database schema optimization, or backend logic implementation.

general.summary: The CV demonstrates a good foundation of technical skills and project experience. However, it needs to be tailored to the specific requirements of the server-side development job description by showcasing relevant skills, projects, and quantifiable achievements. Increasing focus on server-side technologies and improving the clarity and impact of project descriptions will significantly strengthen the application.
top_priorities: Tailor the CV content to highlight server-side development skills (Node.js, Django, REST APIs, databases).
Provide quantifiable results and specific details for projects and experiences.
Improve the clarity and impact of project descriptions by detailing technologies used and server-side contributions.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Système de gestion des transports publics : Conception d’une base de données MySQL pour gérer véhicules, utilisateurs et billets, avec interface graphique pour faciliter l’utilisation.
inline_suggestions.problem: Lacks detail on server-side implementation. No mention of API, backend technologies, or database optimization.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Système de gestion des transports publics : Developed a RESTful API using [Backend framework like Node.js/Express or Django/Python] to manage vehicles, users, and tickets, backed by a MySQL database with optimized schema for performance. Implemented user authentication and authorization.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Stage d’été en 5G - Orange Tunisie & IEEE Technical Activities Tunisia Section - Juillet / Août 2025
inline_suggestions.problem: While relevant to telecommunications, it's not directly relevant to server-side development.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Briefly mention the stage and highlight any server-side or API-related aspects if applicable. Otherwise, prioritize projects with server-side elements.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Programmation : Python, C/C++, POO, MATLAB, Langage Assembleur, VHDL.
inline_suggestions.problem: Lists programming languages, but doesn't highlight the relevant frameworks (e.g., Django for Python).
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Programming: Python (Django, Flask), C/C++, MATLAB, VHDL.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Programming: Python (Django, Flask), C/C++, MATLAB, VHDL.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Développement web et mobiles : HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP.

inline_suggestions.suggestion: Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, RESTful APIs.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, RESTful APIs.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Ecole Supérieure de Communication de Tunis ( SUP’COM ).

inline_suggestions.suggestion: Ecole Supérieure de Communication de Tunis (SUP’COM), Engineering Degree in Telecommunications.
inline_suggestions.replacement: Ecole Supérieure de Communication de Tunis (SUP’COM), Engineering Degree in Telecommunications.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Système d’authentification en C++ : Création d’un programme console permettant l’inscription et la connexion des utilisateurs, avec gestion des mots de passe et des fichiers.
inline_suggestions.problem: While showcasing programming ability, lacks details on security aspects relevant to server-side development.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Système d’authentification en C++: Developed a console application for user registration and login, incorporating secure password hashing and storage using [mention library or algorithm used e.g., bcrypt].

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Mise en place et validation d’un banc d’essai 5G SA (Standalone) avec intégration SIM et gNB.
inline_suggestions.problem: Not directly related to server-side development. Focus should be on highlighting relevant skills.
inline_suggestions.suggestion: Briefly mentioned the technical aspects of this experience, and prioritize relevant experiences for the application.

inline_suggestions.text_snippet: Préparation de cas d’usage et démonstrations pour un hackathon 5G.
inline_suggestions.problem: Not directly related to server-side development, unless it involved server-side technologies.
